Name: milk spray-drying | spray-drying of milk | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products
Description: Two-stage drying occurs in a spray dryer operated at high temperature (200C) with Vibro-Fluidizer.  ;Spray dryer and fluid bed power consumption are respectively 130 kW and 20 kW. Fuel oil consumption of the spray dryer is 205 kg/h and steam consumption of the fluid bed is 167 kg/h. Evaporator capacity is 3,5 ton of evaporated milk per hour. ;References : ;WESTERGAARD, V. ( 2004). Milk powder technology : evaporation and spray drying. Report for GEA Niro, Danemark. 301 p.
